DOC.brief_summary: The COPD Patient-Powered Research Network ( COPD PPRN ) patient research registry goal enrol 75,000 COPD patient risk willing share heath information several year participate research . The COPD PPRN build online platform allow volunteer enroll electronically , complete survey , contact study qualify become connected COPD resource . The goal registry speed research find good treatment COPD ultimately cure .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old say yes one following : COPD diagnosis Current former smoker Family history respiratory disease Symptomatic respiratory disease NonEnglish speaking
